text:
*Version Update | v0.0.20*
What's changed?
- :new: `remove` command, which can delete files or folders and their files from the Design Manager.
NOTE: When in a `watch` process, deleted files being watched will automatically be deleted from the Design Manager.
- :new: Error message/handling improvements
- :bug: Bug fix for single module fetch

Run `npm install -g @HubSpot/cms-cli@latest` to update your version of the tools and get access to these new features!
Awesome! Will `sync` also delete files, or only `watch`?

Hey Doug!

You can use the `remove` command if you want to remove a file or folder and its files outside of a watch task: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development-reference#remove>

`sync` will not do any deleting
:wave: - weâ€™re also planning to roll the ability to upload a directory into the `upload` command and retire the `sync` command for now. Let us know if you have concerns with that proposed change.
